ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Staff and resources for preparation of experimental plots, pasture measurement and animal experimentation on-farm were provided by the Victorian Government (Department of Jobs, Precincts and Regions, DJPR). The authors thank staff from Rutherglen (Greg Seymour, Nick Linden, Meredith Mitchell) and Attwood (Matthew Kerr, Wayne Brown) for their contribution in conducting the feeding trial and collecting pasture samples in the experimental plots and muscle samples in the abattoir. The staff of the co-operating abattoir at Kyneton, Victoria are thanked for their assistance during the slaughter of lambs and muscle sample collection.
